context: Hi, want a romantic movie? Say Anything... (1989) is good
I love romantic movies I haven’t seen that one one of my favorites is P.S. I Love You (2007) I will check it out August Rush (2007) was another good one
resp: P.S. I Love You (2007) was good. How about Sleepless in Seattle (1993) and/or When Harry Met Sally... (1989) or even Love Story (1970)

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific genre or type of movie?
I love thrilling action, daring adventure, and gripping suspense in movies. Do you have any recommendations that cover those genres?
context.feelings: I hope the recommender understands my love for thrilling action, daring adventure, and gripping suspense in movies. I can't wait to see what recommendations they have for me!

context.content: Based on your preference for thrilling action, daring adventure, and gripping suspense, I recommend "Mission: Impossible" for an exhilarating movie experience!
Can you tell me more about "Mission: Impossible"? I'd like to know if it's an action-packed adventure with gripping suspense.
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about "Mission: Impossible" and see if it aligns with my preferences. I hope it's as thrilling and adventurous as I'm looking for. The recommender seems to understand my interests, but I'll have to see if this movie truly meets all my criteria.

context.content: "Mission: Impossible" is a thrilling action film that follows the adventures of Ethan Hunt, a skilled operative in the Impossible Missions Force (IMF). It's filled with daring stunts, intense action sequences, and gripping suspense as Ethan and his team take on high-stakes missions.
That sounds amazing! I'm definitely up for "Mission: Impossible." It seems to have everything I'm looking for in a movie. I can't wait to watch it! [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited about "Mission: Impossible" because it sounds like it has thrilling action, daring adventure, and gripping suspense. I can't wait to watch it!
